text: Martin Hristov (; born 6 December 1980) is a former Bulgarian football winger. Hristov's first club was Cherno More Varna. ==References== Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:PFC Cherno More Varna players Category:PFC Svetkavitsa players Category:PFC Slavia Sofia players Category:PFC Vidima-Rakovski Sevlievo players Category:FC Chernomorets Balchik players
title: Martin Hristov
